headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Now at Benny's: New Cars and Upgrades
content: Benny is branching out. Two new sports cars are now available at bennysoriginalmotorworks.com: the Karin Sultan and Bravado Banshee. Bring these cars to Bennyâ€™s garage for premium upgrades into wide body race cars, the Karin Sultan RS and the Bravado Banshee 900R.
